Package codeContext

Class CodeContext

java.lang.Object
codeContext.CodeContext
public class CodeContext extends Object
General representation of code context -aggregation of both global context and top inner context
Author:
Jakub Perdek

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected ExportedObjectInterface
    defaultContext
    Default top inner context
    protected String
    fileName
    The name of processed file from which context are aggregated
    protected GlobalContext
    globalContext
    Global context - accessible in all places (such as variables declared as var in JavaScript)
    protected InnerContext
    innerContext
    Inner context - the context known as local context, context inside functions, classes

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CodeContext(GlobalContext globalContext, InnerContext innerContext, String fileName)
    Creates the base code context and stores global, actually processed/top inner context and file name

  • Constructor Details

    • CodeContext

      public CodeContext(GlobalContext globalContext, InnerContext innerContext, String fileName)
      Creates the base code context and stores global, actually processed/top inner context and file name
      Parameters:
      globalContext - - global context - accessible in all places (such as variables declared as var in JavaScript)
      innerContext - - inner context - the context known as local context, context inside functions, classes
      fileName - - the name of processed file from which context are aggregated

  • Method Details

    • getFileName

      public String getFileName()
      Returns the file name
      Returns:
      the file name

    • findExportedContext

      public void findExportedContext(org.json.simple.JSONObject astRoot)
      Finds exported context from all contexts in given application AST and sets it as default context
      Parameters:
      astRoot - - given application AST from which the contexts are harvested

    • addImport

      public void addImport(org.json.simple.JSONObject astImport)
      Adds import to the global imports if import contains "importClause"
      Parameters:
      astImport - - the import that should be added to the global imports if contains "importClause"

    • addVariable

      public static void addVariable(GlobalContext globalContext, InnerContext innerContext, org.json.simple.JSONObject astRoot, org.json.simple.JSONObject astVariable, String declarationName, String contentText, boolean isDirectlyExported) throws NotFoundVariableDeclaration
      Assigns the processed variable to local (let, const in JavaScript) or global context (var in JavaScript) according to its declaration
      Parameters:
      globalContext - - global context - accessible in all places (such as variables declared as var in JavaScript)
      innerContext - - inner context - the context known as local context, context inside functions, classes
      astRoot - - the root of application AST
      astVariable - - the AST of actually processed variable
      declarationName - - the name of declaration
      contentText - - information about the type of declaration (var, let or const in JavaScript) extracted from the text in application AST on root layer
      isDirectlyExported - - information if the code context is exported, true if ode context is exported otherwise false
      Throws:
      NotFoundVariableDeclaration

    • getActualVariables

      public List<VariableObject> getActualVariables(long currentPosition)
      Harvests variables, parameters including global ones to "actual"/specified position in this inner code context
      Parameters:
      currentPosition - - the current position in the aplication AST to decide about what is "actual"
      Returns:
      the list of actual variables, parameters of previously accessible from this inner context to actual position and global variables

    • getGlobalContext

      public GlobalContext getGlobalContext()
      Returns the global context (with global variable, accessible on various places in the script)
      Returns:
      the global context (with global variable, accessible on various places in the script)

    • getInnerContext

      public InnerContext getInnerContext()
      Returns the representation of inner context from this instance
      Returns:
      the representation of inner context from this instance

    • createDescriptiveJSON

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject createDescriptiveJSON(int reachedPosition)
      Returns and creates the descriptive JSON represented output from information about the code context
      Parameters:
      reachedPosition - - the "actual" position reached in the script to get available (declared) variables and calls
      Returns:
      the descriptive JSON represented output from information about the code context
